fields.title: Podcast 02
fields.description:
Masincokole ngamabali esithi sizibalisele wona malunga nemali zethu

Join us as we tackle some of the common myths we tend to believe about personal money matters

fields.title: Podcast 01
fields.description:
This first episode is a conversation on the introductory principles using the humble mealie cob

Esi siqendu sokuqala yincoko echaza ngokuphathwa kakuhle kwemali kusetyenziswa isikhwebu sombona

aboutBlock.title: Babalwa Nonkenge
aboutBlock.copy:
Babalwa Nonkenge is a seasoned business leader whose tenure of twenty years spans the areas of taxation, asset management and banking. Babalwa has vast experience in servicing the needs of institutional and retail clients. Her most recent assignments in banking include global markets in the role of Chief of Staff. In retail retail banking, she was responsible for running an unsecured credit book. In the latter capacity she was the executive responsible for the successful sale of the book in a noteworthy M&A transaction concluded in January 2020.

Babalwa is passionate about sharing her educational and professional experiences in her mother tongue isixhosa. She is a Tutu Leadership Fellow (2018) and has also participated in senior leadership development programs such as Masedi Excellence for Senior Women leaders and Lead with Humanity.

She is the founder of Epokothweni with Babalwa Nonkenge.

companyBlock.title: Company Info
companyBlock.copy:
### Why Epokothweni was founded

Epokothweni was birthed to ensure that the speakers of African languages have the dignity of having access to knowledge of financial markets, economics and personal financial stewardship content delivered in their mother tongue. Isixhosa happens to be the mother tongue of the podcast host, but the ultimate dream is to give all African language speakers these forms of knowledge in an accessible manner whether directly through the podcast host herself or through collaborations with like-minded professionals particularly of African descent.

serviceBlock.title: EPOKOTHWENI SERVICES
serviceBlock.blockCopy: Services offered fully bilingually in English and Isixhosa according to client preference
serviceBlock.column1Text:
Would you like a personal financial plan, Portfolio optimization or assistance to get out of debt?
Please contact us by 
filling out the form below.
serviceBlock.column2Text: Would you like to know what financial stewardship means in the context of non profits? Do your groups need customized learning programs? Please contact us by filling out the form below.
serviceBlock.column3Text:
Let us assist you in messaging around your products, services and educational content with your teams in order to speak more effectively to speakers of indigenous African languages.
We are also able to create customized training programs for groups and individuals. Please contact us by filling out the form below.
serviceBlock.column4Text:
Let us assist you in messaging around your products, services and educational content with your teams in order to speak more effectively to speakers of indigenous African languages.
We are also able to create customized training programs for groups and individuals. Please fill out the form below to contact us.
